questions.question: Walk with slow and heavy steps
Amusing name given to a person
A far of place on the mountain where few people live
(Write) Why did the boys find chibi strange
answers: because he would sit alone in dark space
he did not pay attention in class
he never mixed with any one in the class

questions.question: (Write) Why was chibi called crow boy
answers: because he imitated voice of crow at the talent show

questions.question: (Write) How did Mr Isobe's kindness help chibi
answers: He helped chibi to become confident
He helped chibi to imitate crow

questions.question: While he palyed, he spent time talking to chibi. Who is he?
(Write) What did Mr Isobe talked to chibi about
(Write) We were struct with wonder ...... Who are we in above line
(Write) We were struct with wonder ...... Why were they wonder struct
answers: because they thought chibi did not know anything
but chibi proved to be very talented

questions.question: (Write) How did Chibi surprised all the boys in the school
answers: They were surprised with Chibi's hidden talent
when he produced sounds of crows

questions.question: (Write) How do we know that Mr Isobe was a kind teacher
answers: He helped Chibi leave his shyness
He helped Chibi to display his talent
He taught students to respect those who are different
